Translations.Text: Nimen ke qingzhuang [ru nianqing li zhuang] chuzheng huo zhong zhuang [ru lao ruo bing can] chuzheng, nimen dang yong nimen de caichan he shengming wei an la zhi dao fendou [zhu]. Zhe dui nimen shi zui hao de, jiaru nimen zhi dao.

Jiaru zhe shi linjin de liyi [qianmian you zhanlipin] he rongyi de luxing, tamen biding zhuisui ni, dan na juli [ta bu ke zhanyi] dui tamen tai yuanle. Tamen yi an la fashi:“Jiaru women you nengli, women yiding tong nimen yiqi chuzheng.” Tamen zi xun miewang. An la zhi dao, tamen que shi shuohuang zhe.
An la yuanliang ni [mu sheng]le! Ni zai ren qing shuo shihua zhe he shuohuang zhe zhiqian, ni weisheme jiu zhunxu tamen bu chuzheng ne?[Ying zai shengzhan zhong bian zhen jia].
Fan quexin an la he mori [zhu] zhe wei yaoqiu ni mianchu yong tamen de caichan he shengming [wei an la zhi dao] zhandou. An la shi quanzhi jingwei zhe de.
Wei bu xinyang an la he mori zhe cai hui xiang ni qingjia [mianchu shengzhan], tamen de xinzhong gandao huaiyi, tamen zai ziji de huaiyi zhong youyu bu jue.

Jiaru tamen juexin chuzheng, tamen biding zhunbei jiuxule, dan an la bu xihuan tamen chuzheng, suoyi cai rang tamen liu zai houmian. Youren [dui tamen] shuo:“Nimen tong liu zai houfang de renmen yiqi dai zai jiazhong ba!”
Jiaru tamen tong nimen yiqi chuzheng, tamen zhi hui gei nimen tianluan, zhi hui zai nimen zhong shandong panluan, er nimen zhong youxie ren hui tingcong tamen de. An la shi quanzhi bu yi zhe de.
